name: Stick Hero Pirate Fight Man
description:
Pirate king. You're ready to get involved with the new adventure!
Featuring a tactical action game, teamed up with your teammates to take you to the far reaches of the vast ocean where historical treasures are still out there.
You will have to confront the most infamous pirates. fierce monsters. The huge giants that everyone must fear.
Then you should not miss our "Stick pirate Hero"!
With :
Beautiful 2D graphics.
Simple features make it easy to control.
Beautiful action scenes
The combo monster
Sounds true.
All will help you as you are adventurous with your character
So what are you waiting for? Join today to experience many great features.
Conquer all to reach the glory
